EmailTemplate.name: Currency Center Monthly Survey Notification First
EmailTemplate.subject: Monthly Survey reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Currency Center users,
In order to ensure complete and accurate reporting of the monthly currency repatriation report, we would be grateful for your time to fill in our data collection regarding blocked funds. It is very important that you report back to us : Amount blocked in respective currencies as at month end Allocation amounts received Any on ground activities/discussions being carried out from your end to unlock blocked funds situation. Any specific topic/subject matter you would like a particular focus on Please ensure you provide us with complete information by latest 14th {!CASE(MONTH(TODAY()),1,'January',2,'February',3,'March',4,'April',5,'May',6,'June',7,'July',8,'August',9,'September',10,'October',11,'November',12,'December','')}. Your participation is essential to IATA Currency Repatriation advocacy efforts. Should you have any queries or more feedback, please log a case in your IATA Customer Portal under the topic "Currency Center".
Kind regards, Currency Center Team
